sources.title: 1936 Dahinten In Der Heide ( Hilde Weissner, Hans Stüwe, Hermann, Speelmanns)
sources.description: Film aus dem deutschen dritten Reich von 1936. Dahinten in der Heide.  U.a mit Hans Stüwe und Hermann Speelmanns.

metadata.Plot: A man supposed to be dead returns from the US to save his family land, resist a rival's attempt to frame him for a shooting, deal with an odious banker, and make sure the heroine finds the right husband.
metadata.Writer: Hermann Löns, Ernst Hasselbach, Per Schwenzen
metadata.Actors: Hilde Weissner, Hans Stüwe, Hermann Speelmans
